verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be an apostle, <S%G652><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> to the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
(Which <S%G3739><s%> he had promised <S%G4279><s%> before <S%G4279><s%> by his prophets <S%G4396><s%> in the holy <S%G40><s%> scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>)

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> of the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh; <S%G4561><s%>

And declared <S%G3724><s%> to be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with power, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of holiness, <S%G42><s%> by the resurrection <S%G386><s%> from the dead: <S%G3498><s%>

By whom <S%G3739><s%> we have received <S%G2983><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> and apostleship, <S%G651><s%> for obedience <S%G5218><s%> to the faith <S%G4102><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> for his name: <S%G3686><s%>
Among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are you also <S%G2532><s%> the called <S%G2822><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To all <S%G3956><s%> that be in Rome, <S%G4516><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints: <S%G40><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

First, <S%G4412><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for you all, <S%G3956><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is spoken <S%G2605><s%> of throughout <S%G1722><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> is my witness, <S%G3144><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> with my spirit <S%G4151><s%> in the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of his Son, <S%G5207><s%> that without <S%G89><s%> ceasing <S%G89><s%> I make <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you always <S%G3842><s%> in my prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

Making <S%G1189><s%> request, <S%G1189><s%> if <S%G1513><s%> by any <S%G4458><s%> means <S%G4458><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at <S%G4218><s%> length <S%G4218><s%> I might have a prosperous <S%G2137><s%> journey <S%G2137><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you.

For I long <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you, that I may impart <S%G3330><s%> to you some <S%G5100><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gift, <S%G5486><s%> to the end <S%G1519><s%> you may be established; <S%G4741><s%>
That is, that I may be comforted <S%G4837><s%> together <S%G4837><s%> with you by the mutual <S%G1722><s%> <S%G240><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of you and me.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not have you ignorant, <S%G50><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> that oftentimes <S%G4178><s%> I purposed <S%G4388><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you, (but was let <S%G2967><s%> till now, <S%G891><s%> <S%G1204><s%>) that I might hav <S%G2192><s%>e som <S%G5100><s%>e frui <S%G2590><s%>t amon <S%G1722><s%>g you also, <S%G2532><s%> eve <S%G2532><s%>n as amon <S%G1722><s%>g othe <S%G3062><s%>r Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> debtor <S%G3781><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> and to the Barbarians; <S%G915><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the wise, <S%G4680><s%> and to the unwise. <S%G453><s%>
So, <S%G3779><s%> as much <S%G2596><s%> as in me is, I am ready <S%G4289><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you that are at <S%G1722><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

For I am not ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%> for it is the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to salvation <S%G4991><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> one that believes; <S%G4100><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>

For therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> is the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> from faith <S%G4102><s%> to faith: <S%G4102><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> The just <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is revealed <S%G601><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> hold <S%G2722><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in unrighteousness; <S%G93><s%>
Because <S%G1360><s%> that which may be known <S%G1110><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is manifest <S%G5319><s%> in them; for God <S%G2316><s%> has showed <S%G5319><s%> it to them.

For the invisible <S%G517><s%> things of him from the creation <S%G2937><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> are clearly <S%G2529><s%> seen, <S%G2529><s%> being understood <S%G3539><s%> by the things that are made, <S%G4161><s%> even his eternal <S%G126><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and Godhead; <S%G2305><s%> so <S%G1519><s%> that they are without <S%G379><s%> excuse: <S%G379><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> that, when they knew <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> him not as God, <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G2228><s%> were thankful; <S%G2168><s%> but became <S%G3154><s%> vain <S%G3154><s%> in their imaginations, <S%G1261><s%> and their foolish <S%G801><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> was darkened. <S%G4654><s%>
Professing <S%G5335><s%> themselves to be wise, <S%G4680><s%> they became <S%G3471><s%> fools, <S%G3471><s%>

And changed <S%G236><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the incorruptible <S%G862><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> an image <S%G1504><s%> made <S%G4161><s%> like <S%G3667><s%> to corruptible <S%G5349><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and to birds, <S%G4071><s%> and four footed <S%G5074><s%> beasts, <S%G5074><s%> and creeping <S%G2062><s%> things.

Why <S%G1352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them up to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of their own hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to dishonor <S%G818><s%> their own bodies <S%G4983><s%> between <S%G1722><s%> themselves: <S%G1438><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> changed <S%G3337><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> a lie, <S%G5579><s%> and worshipped <S%G4573><s%> and served <S%G3000><s%> the creature <S%G2937><s%> more <S%G3844><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the Creator, <S%G2936><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is blessed <S%G2128><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them up to vile <S%G819><s%> affections: <S%G3806><s%> for even <S%G5037><s%> their women <S%G2338><s%> did change <S%G3337><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that which is against <S%G3844><s%> nature: <S%G5449><s%>

And likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the men, <S%G730><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> of the woman, <S%G2338><s%> burned <S%G1572><s%> in their lust <S%G3715><s%> one <S%G240><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> men <S%G730><s%> with men <S%G730><s%> working <S%G2716><s%> that which is unseemly, <S%G808><s%> and receiving <S%G618><s%> in themselves <S%G1438><s%> that recompense <S%G489><s%> of their error <S%G4106><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was meet. <S%G1163><s%>

And even <S%G2531><s%> as they did not like <S%G1381><s%> to retain <S%G2192><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in their knowledge, <S%G1922><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them over <S%G3860><s%> to a reprobate <S%G96><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are not convenient; <S%G2520><s%>

Being filled <S%G4137><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> maliciousness; <S%G2549><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of envy, <S%G5355><s%> murder, <S%G5408><s%> debate, <S%G2054><s%> deceit, <S%G1388><s%> malignity; <S%G2550><s%> whisperers, <S%G5588><s%>

Backbiters, <S%G2637><s%> haters <S%G2319><s%> of God, <S%G2319><s%> despiteful, <S%G5197><s%> proud, <S%G5244><s%> boasters, <S%G213><s%> inventors <S%G2182><s%> of evil <S%G2556><s%> things, disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%>
Without <S%G801><s%> understanding, <S%G801><s%> covenant breakers, <S%G802><s%> without <S%G794><s%> natural affection, <S%G794><s%> implacable, <S%G786><s%> unmerciful: <S%G415><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> knowing <S%G1921><s%> the judgment <S%G1345><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that they which commit <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things are worthy <S%G514><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> do the same, <S%G846><s%> but have <S%G2192><s%> pleasure <S%G4909><s%> in them that do <S%G4238><s%> them.
